Sentencas: Perovskite-structured (La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3) LSCF has been widely studied as a cathode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: However, the application of LSCF cathode is likely to be limited by its sluggish surface catalytic properties and long-term stability issues.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: Oxygen hyper-stoichiometric La2NiO4+delta with K2NiF4 structure exhibits higher catalytic properties, ionic conductivity, and stability in comparison with LSCF cathode.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: Due to the good chemical compatibility of these two cathode materials, it is possible to prepare a composite cathode by the infiltration of La2NiO4+delta in the porous LSCF.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: This composite structure fully utilizes the advantages of the two cathodes and enhances the LSCF cathode performance.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: In this study, the LSCF cathode was deposited by using an atmospheric plasma spray technique, and the porous LSCF cathode was then infiltrated by La2NiO4+delta.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: The atmospheric plasma spray technique was used to reduce the SOFC manufacturing cost.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: The microstructure of coatings was characterized by SEM and EDS.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: The cathode polarization resistance was found to decrease by similar to 40% after the La2NiO4+delta infiltration.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement

Sentencas: Also, the activation energy decreased from 1.53 to 1.40 eV.
Titulo: La2NiO4+δ Infiltration of Plasma-Sprayed LSCF Coating for Cathode Performance Improvement
